## Problem 1

```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

```{r}
mean_flipper_length= mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm,na.rm = TRUE)  
```
A short description of the penguins dataset:
This is the penguins dataset. The important variables' names include species, island, bill_length_mm, bill_depth_mm, flipper_length_mm,body_mass_g, sex, and year. 
There are 344 rows and 8 columns in the dataset (344 observations of 8 variables). 
The mean flipper length = 200.92
